p: The pediatric population was defined as children younger than 19 years of age at the time of hospital admission [ 11, 12]. Pediatric population estimates for 2008â€“2010 and growth statistics were obtained from BC STATS [ 13]. BC STATS is the official source for population figures within British Columbia health authorities. The analyses were based on the PEOPLE 35 [ 13] release which contains population counts by year, gender, local health area, and individual year of age. Data projecting pediatric population growth for 2020 and 2030 were obtained from the BC STATS component/cohort-survival model [ 13].
